CONVIS.description: If any selection is made, a player's token must match one or more of the checks to see this token.
CONVIS.characterFeaturesHint: A token's actor must have a feature with a matching name
CONVIS.customVisionHint: A token must have this ability granted on the Token Vision panel
CONVIS.skillCheckHint: A token's actor must beat the SKILL CHECK TBD
CONVIS.charactersHint: These characters can see the the target
